text: Is it possible to revert pages back to the old non-drag-n-drop editor?
Hey there! I’m Kyle, I work on the page editors at HubSpot. Can you tell me a little bit more about this?

Hey <@U3ND6HWQZ>! Sure thing...a former client had someone change their homepage into the new drag-n-drop editor and this has broken some of the customizations the page had so they are asking if we can revert the page back to the classic editor so we can re-connect it to the template. Does that make sense?
I think so. You don’t happen to have a link to their homepage handy, do you?
